<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Typedefs

### EntryInfoMap {#aac4eda35d4dd1470f532505eeeb8cf96}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::LiveRangeCalc::EntryInfoMap =  DenseMap&lt;LiveRange &#42;, std::pair&lt;BitVector, BitVector&gt;&gt;</>}>
Map <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> to sets of blocks (represented by bit vectors) that in the live range are defined on entry and undefined on entry.

A block is defined on entry if there is a path from at least one of the defs in the live range to the entry of the block, and conversely, a block is undefined on entry, if there is no such path (i.e. no definition reaches the entry of the block). A single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangecalc">LiveRangeCalc</a> object is used to track live-out information for multiple registers in live range splitting (which is ok, since the live ranges of these registers do not overlap), but the defined/undefined information must be kept separate for each individual range. By convention, EntryInfoMap&#91;&amp;LR&#93; = &#123; Defined, Undefined &#125;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

LiveOutMap - Map basic blocks to the value leaving the block.

### LiveOutPair {#a85afb5ab5edc2205dfdcdb8f5fad518d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::LiveRangeCalc::LiveOutPair =  std::pair&lt;VNInfo &#42;, MachineDomTreeNode &#42;&gt;</>}>
LiveOutPair - A value and the block that defined it.

The domtree node is redundant, it can be computed as: MDT&#91;Indexes.getMBBFromIndex(VNI-&gt;def)&#93;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### addLiveInBlock() {#a46981dd5d4bb3043b740ce285b7b4a95}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LiveRangeCalc::addLiveInBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42; DomNode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Kill=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a>())</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
addLiveInBlock - Add a block with an unknown live-in value.

This function can only be called once per basic block. Once the live-in value has been determined, <a href="#ae5c960114840d1c6dddfbaa529ac633e">calculateValues()</a> will add liveness to LI.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="LR">The live range that is live-in to the block.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="DomNode">The domtree node for the block.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Kill">Index in block where LI is killed. If the value is live-through, set Kill = SLotIndex() and also call setLiveOutValue(MBB, 0).</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00243">243</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### calculateValues() {#ae5c960114840d1c6dddfbaa529ac633e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LiveRangeCalc::calculateValues ()">
calculateValues - Calculate the value that will be live-in to each block added with addLiveInBlock.

Add PHI-def values as needed to preserve SSA form. Add liveness to all live-in blocks up to the Kill point, or the whole block for live-through blocks.

Every predecessor of a live-in block must have been given a value with setLiveOutValue, the value may be null for live-trough blocks.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00255">255</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### extend() {#ad445a5028efdf094173a202811f003e3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRangeCalc::extend (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Use, unsigned PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &gt; Undefs)</>}>
Extend the live range of <code>LR</code> to reach <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a></code>.

The existing values in <code>LR</code> must be live so they jointly dominate <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a></code>. If <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a></code> is not dominated by a single existing value, PHI-defs are inserted as required to preserve SSA form.

PhysReg, when set, is used to verify live-in lists on basic blocks.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00207">207</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00086">86</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### reset() {#a65f0beed94a7dbdf8c8d7e2b46a0afa0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRangeCalc::reset (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42; mf, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> &#42; SI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &#42; MDT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo/#aa750a7f159760b9c378d930deb6a9837">VNInfo::Allocator</a> &#42; VNIA)</>}>
reset - Prepare caches for a new set of non-overlapping live ranges.

The caches must be reset before attempting calculations with a live range that may overlap a previously computed live range, and before the first live range in a function. If live ranges are not known to be non-overlapping, call reset before each.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00190">190</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setLiveOutValue() {#ae8e6fcd2d2e7e04fb1aa8fab71910f68}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LiveRangeCalc::setLiveOutValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo">VNInfo</a> &#42; VNI)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
setLiveOutValue - Indicate that VNI is live out from MBB.

The <a href="#ae5c960114840d1c6dddfbaa529ac633e">calculateValues()</a> function will not add liveness for MBB, the caller should take care of that.

VNI may be null only if MBB is a live-through block also passed to <a href="#a46981dd5d4bb3043b740ce285b7b4a95">addLiveInBlock()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00229">229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### findReachingDefs() {#ae243990ea455fd5ec0c3c70785a17228}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRangeCalc::findReachingDefs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; UseMBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Use, unsigned PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &gt; Undefs)</>}>
Find the set of defs that can reach <code>Kill</code>.

<code>Kill</code> must belong to <code>UseMBB</code>.

If exactly one def can reach <code>UseMBB</code>, and the def dominates <code>Kill</code>, all paths from the def to <code>UseMBB</code> are added to <code>LR</code>, and the function returns true.

If multiple values can reach <code>UseMBB</code>, the blocks that need <code>LR</code> to be live in are added to the LiveIn array, and the function returns false.

The array <code>Undef</code> provides the locations where the range <code>LR</code> becomes undefined by &lt;def,read-undef&gt; operands on other subranges. If <code>Undef</code> is non-empty and <code>Kill</code> is jointly dominated only by the entries of <code>Undef</code>, the function returns false.

PhysReg, when set, is used to verify live-in lists on basic blocks.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00149">149</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00190">190</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isDefOnEntry() {#aecb04af202c3560e42fad62a5506f763}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRangeCalc::isDefOnEntry (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &gt; Undefs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; DefOnEntry, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; UndefOnEntry)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the entry to block <code>MBB</code> can be reached by any of the defs in <code>LR</code>.

Return true if none of the defs reach the entry to <code>MBB</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00121">121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateSSA() {#a8724ca9a385ad023d80339599cc037df}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LiveRangeCalc::updateSSA ()">
updateSSA - Compute the values that will be live in to all requested blocks in LiveIn.

Create PHI-def values as required to preserve SSA form.

Every live-in block must be jointly dominated by the added live-out blocks. No values are read from the live ranges.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00157">157</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp/#l00331">331</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liverangecalc-cpp">LiveRangeCalc.cpp</a>.

### LiveIn {#abbb6fcf43c4c5e0e2778ce03512250a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;LiveInBlock, 16&gt; llvm::LiveRangeCalc::LiveIn</>}>
LiveIn - Work list of blocks where the live-in value has yet to be determined.

This list is typically computed by findReachingDefs() and used as a work list by updateSSA(). The low-level interface may also be used to add entries directly.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Map {#a9e5608bb9852fb86990af4dd05842128}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LiveOutMap llvm::LiveRangeCalc::Map">
Map each basic block where a live range is live out to the live-out value and its defining block.

For every basic block, MBB, one of these conditions shall be true:


<ul>
<li>!Seen.count(MBB-&gt;getNumber()) Blocks without a Seen bit are ignored.</li>
<li>LiveOut&#91;MBB&#93;.second.getNode() == MBB The live-out value is defined in MBB.</li>
<li>forall P in preds(MBB): LiveOut&#91;P&#93; == LiveOut&#91;MBB&#93; The live-out value passses through MBB. All predecessors must carry the same value.</li>
</ul>


The domtree node may be null, it can be computed.

The map can be shared by multiple live ranges as long as no two are live-out of the same block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00096">96</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Seen {#a5b21a9bc676c95be138caf3757ac6d59}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="BitVector llvm::LiveRangeCalc::Seen">
Bit vector of active entries in LiveOut, also used as a visited set by findReachingDefs.

One entry per basic block, indexed by block number. This is kept as a separate bit vector because it can be cleared quickly when switching live ranges.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h/#l00063">63</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liverangecalc-h">LiveRangeCalc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isJointlyDominated() {#a13c4005ea769c09d88be76fa40744e7e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRangeCalc::isJointlyDominated (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &gt; Defs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> &amp; Indexes)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
A diagnostic function to check if the end of the block <code>MBB</code> is jointly dominated by the blocks corresponding to the slot indices in <code>Defs</code>.

This function is mainly for use in self-verification checks.
